name: CLARITY_PRC
description: The CLARITY_PRC table contains one record for each visit type, panel, agent, and visit type modifier in your system.

columns.name: PRC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the visit type record.

columns.name: PRC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the visit type.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: The visit type name on reports and letters sent to patients.
